func.title: GetPlayerView

param.name: player
param.desc: Number of the player whose view you want to determine.

func.desc: Returns the object which is followed by a player's view. If the player view does not currently follow an object, the function returns nil (also see GetPlayerViewMode).
func.remark: If player view has been set using (SetPlayerView), the view will follow the selected clonk (unless in view mode "Scroll", see GetPlayerViewMode). This can be determined using GetCursor.
Prior to 9.0 OC this was known as GetPlrView.
